Class KeyCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • Collectable
      • KeyCard

  • public class KeyCard
extends Collectable
    KeyCards are collected by the character, they will match with a coloured door based on colour and will let the character open them if collected.. The KeyCard class is a subclass of the Collectable class.
    Creation Date: 20/11/19.
    Last Modification Date: 4/12/19.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Timothy Roger (977422), Jumaira Miller (983101)
